channel.title: [Need Help][Please Read This!][Need Urgent help!]
channel.description:
I have my client and source for my server But there's one problem all the runes you use to cast spells like ancients. Do not work i wondered if there was a way to cast spells without runes. For example cast vengeance without runes and ancients. This would be great and it would help my server allot. If anyone could help me that would be great.
Thanks.
